summary: Provides a utility class that stores the mean and standard deviation of CLIP image embeddings for the Stable UnCLIP diffusion pipeline and offers methods to normalize embeddings before adding noise and to reverse the normalization after processing, with support for moving the parameters across devices.
business_intent: Facilitates accurate preprocessing and postâ€‘processing of image embeddings in the Stable UnCLIP generation workflow, ensuring consistent scaling and device compatibility to improve model quality and stability.
